description: WordPerfect Corporation released version 6 of WordPerfect in 1993. This version of the program was the first to include a graphical editing mode, which showed allowed users to see how their document would appear when printed while editing.
By default, WordPerfect 6 saves users' documents as WP6 files. The WP6 format replaced the .WP5 format and was itself replaced by the .WP7 format.
